Item.sqlserver_body:
/* name: item_id.sql created: 28-MAR-2003 George J. Carrette, for Army WVA project. purpose: to support item creation from sql code. note: Call this one using ITEM_ID(NEWID()) because NEWID() cannot be used inside the function itself due to the limitation against non-determinism within functions */
create function innovator.item_id(@X uniqueidentifier) RETURNS CHAR (32) AS BEGIN DECLARE @Y CHAR(36) SET @Y = CONVERT(CHAR(36),@X) RETURN(SUBSTRING(@Y,1,8)+ SUBSTRING(@Y,10,4)+SUBSTRING(@Y,15,4)+SUBSTRING(@Y,20,4)+ SUBSTRING(@Y,25,12)) END
Item.name: item_id
